NURS.Data.Quality 0.1
  • Reference

    Reference

    Report Funtions

    Functions for generating automated DQ reports from local data sets.

    loc_date_DQ_report()

    Automatically generate a RMD report of data quality issues.

    missing_DQ_report()

    Automatically generate a RMD report of data quality issues.

    Shiny apps

    Function to …

    data.quality.app()

    R shiny app for visualizing data quality patterns

    mutual.info.app()

    Interactive app for tracking mutual info.

    grouped.info.app()

    Interactive app for tracking mutual info across a grouping varibale.

    grouped.info.function()

    Internal wrapper to grouped.info.plot

    start_mutual_info_app()

    Start app for visualizing mutual info

    Missing data functions

    Function to …

    data.quality()

    Data quality measures

    compare_frequencies()

    Vector function - check that no single value of a variable is used more than a set limit.

    compare_frame_frequencies()

    Tests all variables in a data frame to check values aren't used too often.

    compare_classes()

    Checks if there are enough examples for the number of classes in a variable.

    compare_frame_classes()

    Check each variable of a data frame to determine if there are enough examples for the number of distinct values. NB: will return a spurious result for continous valued variables.

    average_missing()

    Dataframe function - measure the average rate of missingness on a column

    average_missing_heuristic()

    Check if missing data rate is less than set limit.

    missing_mine()

    Analyze each column of a data set that has missing values for patterns of missingness.
